branchCategory.name: C(D)U-A, Free Mount Cylinder with Air Cushion
branchCategory.description: <p>The series CU-A single rod, double acting, air cushion free mount cylinder saves space and allows direct and precise mounting. Air cushion is used to help with end of stroke noise and has higher kinetic energy absorption. Options include auto-switch capabilities, free mount choices, recessed switch mounting grooves and rubber bumpers standard.</p>
